sense.gloss: to strike, to hit, to beat, to punch
stake all (on something), play for all or nothing, throwing all into a task

r_ele.r: てきだんはっしゃとう

sense.gloss: throwing event (e.g. javelin, discus, shot put)
throwing event (e.g. javelin, discus, shot put)

sdata.j: ↑乾坤一擲↑↓けんこんいってき↓の↑大↑↓だい↓↑勝負↑↓しょうぶ↓。↑情↑↓なさ↓けないけどこれが↑見事↑↓みごと↓↑空振↑↓からぶ↓りに↑終↑↓お↓わったんだなあ。
sdata.e: It was all-or-nothing and we struck out spectacularly.

sdata.j: 「↑刀↑↓かたな↓の↑投擲↑↓とうてき↓の↑練習↑↓れんしゅう↓？」「すっぽ↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けただけです」
sdata.e: Practising sword throwing? "It just slipped out of my hands."

sdata.j: ↑投擲↑↓とうてき↓↑用↑↓よう↓のナイフが↑男↑↓おとこ↓たちの↑首筋↑↓くびすじ↓に↑深々↑↓ふかぶか↓と↑突↑↓つ↓き↑刺↑↓さ↓さっていた。
sdata.e: Throwing knives were stuck deep into the men's necks.

words.gloss: to strike, to hit, to beat, to punch
stake all (on something), play for all or nothing, throwing all into a task
